For the students. By the students.  The Math and Science Learning Center (MSLC) is a welcoming learning environment that provides diverse forms of academic support to students in Math and Science courses at UIC. We are excited for you to join us as we ask questions, explore challenging concepts, develop new ideas, and learn together.               May 4 Update  The MSLC is currently closed to visitors but academic support services are available online!  During exam week (May 4-8), please check your course Blackboard sites for detailed information about your finals as well as any review sessions and academic support that may be  provided for your courses.   Please reach out to us if you have any questions at any time: mslc@uic.edu  Please keep up your great work and best wishes or a fantastic finals week!
